timeline.message: Refactor(Azure Library): Rename work item classes and add license headers
Feat(Azure Library): Add tests for utils

timeline.bodyText: What is the intended use for this class? It looks like it's only used in the tests.

replies.bodyText: Are we not able to deserialize the response into java objects correctly?
replies.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: It's a utility to extract the actual objects from fields fields in certain Azure responses where the fields object of the response is dynamic.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: This is a non-exhaustive list of known fields that are possible on a WorkItem.
